grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 行乞【ギョウコツ】going on an alms round (for food), going begging (for food), going to ask for alms of food, pindacara
乞巧奠【キッコウデン】Festival to Plead for Skills (progenitor festival of Tanabata)
kun reading compounds: 請う【こう】to beg, to ask, to request, to invite
乞高評【こうこうひょう】with the author's compliments
